biotools.summary: Casboundary is a method which is able to automatically define CRISPR cassette boundaries. In addition. It contains a Cas type predictive model used to assign each gene located in the region defined by a cassette’s boundaries a Cas label from a set of pre-defined Cas types. Furthermore, the proposed method can detect potentially new cas genes and decompose a cassette into its modules.
